question: Write a letter to your local council about the state of the sport club facilities and request more facilities suitable for people of your age.- Describe your sport club facilities.- What facilities are required?- Explain why people of your age need these facilities.
text: I am writing this letter to draw your attention to the sports facilities which are lacking in our city.

Recently I have shifted to this wonderful city with my family, but to ,surprise I came to know that there is not big stadium available in the city, which provide a variety of sporting facilities under a single roof. I think the development of a stadium is vital for the proper development of the people living here.

I am a national level hockey player and working in the public sector under sports quota and most of the time I keep on travelling. But when I will be at home it will be difficult for me to practice. So if a stadium is opened , I along with other youngsters can ripe the benefit and may make the country proud at the international level.
Apart from this, because of these people can also stay fit and healthy.
Hope you will consider my request.
